EditUsernameModalBody__username-helper.message: Usernames let others message you without needing your phone number. They are paired with a set of digits to help keep your address private.
EditUsernameModalBody__username-helper.description: Shown on the edit username screen

EditUsernameModalBody__learn-more.description: Text that open a popup with information about discriminator in username

EditUsernameModalBody__learn-more__title.description: Title of the popup with information about discriminator in username

EditUsernameModalBody__learn-more__body.message: These digits help keep your username private so you can avoid unwanted messages. Share your username with only the people and groups you’d like to chat with. If you change usernames you’ll get a new set of digits.
EditUsernameModalBody__learn-more__body.description: Body of the popup with information about discriminator in username

icu:UsernameOnboardingModalBody__row__nu.messageformat: Usernames are paired with a set of digits and aren’t shared on your profile
icu:UsernameOnboardingModalBody__row__nu.description: Content of the first row of username onboarding modal

icu:UsernameOnboardingModalBody__row__li.messageformat: Each username has a unique link you can share with your friends to start a chat with you
icu:UsernameOnboardingModalBody__row__li.description: Content of the second row of username onboarding modal

icu:UsernameOnboardingModalBody__row__lo.messageformat: Turn off phone number discovery under Settings > Privacy > Phone Number > Who can find my number, to use your username as the primary way others can contact you.
icu:UsernameOnboardingModalBody__row__lo.description: Content of the third row of username onboarding modal

icu:UsernameOnboardingModalBody__learn-m.description: Text that open a popup with information about username onboarding

icu:UsernameOnboardingModalBody__continu.description: Text of the primary button on username onboarding modal

icu:WhatsNew__v6.11--0.messageformat: Start talking to yourself even faster with a new icon that makes the “Note to Self” chat easier to find. Thanks to {hackerbirds} on GitHub for their contribution.

icu:WhatsNew__v6.12--0.messageformat: Now you can select multiple messages and forward or delete them all at once.

icu:WhatsNew__v6.12--1.messageformat: We updated the Sticker Creator with a few design tweaks and added some helpful tips for aspiring sticker artists. The Sticker Creator now opens in your web browser, which makes Signal Desktop a little smaller and leaves a bit more room on your hard drive for all of your favorite sticker packs.

icu:WhatsNew__v6.13--0.messageformat: Progress report: The new progress bar is ready. Quickly see more information about the loading process whenever you launch Signal Desktop.

icu:WhatsNew__v6.13--1.messageformat: Theme preferences now also apply to the checkboxes in Signal Settings. Thanks to {rakleed} on GitHub for helping us check "More fully embrace darkness in the dark theme" off of our TODO list.
